mapper.select: select user_id from user_test where user_no=1
mapper.insert: insert into board (user_id,user_password,user_tel,user_nickname, user_name,user_address,user_email) values ( user_test_no.nextval, #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_tel}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_name}, #{user_address}, #{user_email})
